timeline.message:
MULE-18582: Application stuck in "starting" status forever when SFTP configured to "reconnect forever" if connection fails on startup

Added the "cancelStart" method to deployables in order to stop things like a reconnect forever policy that will never succed. The cancelStart should be called before attempting to stop and artifact so that the "start" will be able to finish and release the locks that would prevent the "stop" from executing.
